import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./style.css"; import * as hoadonAPI from "../apis/billing"; import BillItem from "./BillItem"; export default class index extends Component { state = { allBilling: [], processingBilling: [], doanhthuthangnay: 0, doanhthuthangtruoc: 0, }; async componentDidMount() { let allBilling = []; let doanhthuthangnay = null; let doanhthuthangtruoc = null; await hoadonAPI .twentyhoadon() .then((success) => { this.allBilling = success.data.value.$values; }) .catch((error) => {}); var homnay = new Date(); await hoadonAPI .doanhthutheothang(homnay.getMonth, homnay.getFullYear) .then((success) => { this.doanhthuthangnay = success.data.tongtien; }) .catch((error) => {}); await hoadonAPI .doanhthutheothang(homnay.getMonth - 1, homnay.getFullYear) .then((success) => { this.doanhthuthangtruoc = success.data.tongtien; }) .catch((error) => {}); this.setState({ allBilling: allBilling, doanhthuthangnay: doanhthuthangnay, doanhthuthangtruoc: doanhthuthangtruoc, }); } render() { return (
